# Trademarks and Brand Use

“Barber Cam” and any related names, marks, logos, taglines, and trade dress are proprietary to
**Faith Frontier Ecclesiastical Trust**.

## No Permission Granted

No rights are granted to use Barber Cam branding in:

- software products
- websites or apps
- marketing or fundraising
- derivatives, forks, or ports
- domains, social handles, or app store listings

## Allowed References

You may:

- reference the project by name in plain text (e.g., “Barber Cam (Preview)”) when linking to the official repository
- discuss high-level concepts without reproducing protected assets

For any branding use, contact: **BarberCamX@ProtonMail.com**
